description: As charming as he sounded on the phone, he looked even better in person. One look in Alec's piercing baby blue eyes and I couldn't wait to see the rest. Of course any 21 year old with a naturally smooth, lean body & the face of the angel is right up our alley but Alec has a lot more going for him then even that.Add to that his adorable accent (like the way he says ?titties?) and a sexual energy that is just like his cock: it was bursting at the seams. He peeled down those tight black briefs to reveal a beautiful uncut cock and a pair of smooth hanging balls that he couldn't wait to unload. The way he stares into the camera, it was easy to see he liked having an audience. And after seeing his cum puddle like a lake between those smooth pecs, I was doing some staring of our own!
title: From Russia With Love, Scene #01
